Literature.Title: Biological consequences of improving the structural stability of hairpins that have antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Sivanesam K, Kier BL, Whedon SD, Chatterjee C, Andersen NH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Corynebacterium glutamicum ATCC 13032(MIC=0.5-0.4µM),Corynebacterium glutamicum ATCC 13032(IC50=0.02µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=50µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(IC50=39µM)
